title: Ruloans reports 40% growth in FY24, reaching Rs 37,500 crore business volume
description: For FY25, Ruloans aims to achieve a growth rate of 30% and reach a business volume of Rs. 50,000 crore.  Ruloans have forayed into education loans as well as solar & machinery loans this financial year and will go more focussed and aggressive on the same.
